title: A comparatiue discourse of the bodies natural and politique VVherein out of the principles of nature, is set forth the true forme of a commonweale, with the dutie of subiects, and right of soueraigne: together with many good points of politicall learning, mentioned in a briefe after the preface. By Edvvard Forset.
author: Forset, Edward, 1553?-1630.
publisher: Printed [by Eliot's Court Press] for Iohn Bill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
